site_name: Development Site At Ergon House Horseferry Road And
description: Variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 29th March 2021 (RN 20/07777/LBC) for the variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 16 November 2020 (RN 20/02557/LBC) which itself varied condition 1 and removed condition 4 (part ii) of listed building consent dated 14 January 2020 (19/07784) for internal alterations, refurbishment, restoration works and partial demolition of rear wing of 9 Millbank and construction of new rear extension to provide residential accommodation. Landscaping within internal courtyard and associated on-site car parking and cycle parking at basement levels; NAMELY, to vary all 9 Millbank balustrades to be changed to powder (PPC) coated finished metal. Further details on the proposed change; Internal layout changes at 9 Millbank Duplex Unit 901 (Level 09, 10) and provision of a new window within the unit at Level 09 to optimise the quality of residential amenity; Changes to roof level terrace of Duplex Unit 901 (Level 09/10) simplifying the levels, balustrading and arrangement of planters to improve general usability and maintenance access; Provision of new guarding and access gate at Level 09 for maintenance; 9 Millbank Level 07 windows changed to be openable in order to provide ventilation to habitablerooms; Installation of new staircase smoke vent and window design at Level 07 of 9 Millbanks North Core and associated relocation and repurposing of existing stained glass window (further details provided below); Design revisions to 9 Millbank North Core riser doors (only noticeable on plan); Amendments to the 9 Millbank South Core risers; Alterations to the 9 Millbank South Core roof screen for simpler construction; New smoke shaft included to north east corner of 9 Millbank building; New smoke extract at Level 09 in 9 Millbank North Core; New abseil fixings and general access and ladders for maintenance purposes; and Updates to ground floor integral lighting locations.
